titleStmt.title: Cupids posies, for bracelets, handkercers, and rings, with scarfes, gloves and other things. Written by Cupid on a day, when Venus gave me leave to play, verbum sat amanti. The lover sheweth his intent, by gifts that are with posies sent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. C. for J. Wright, next to the Globe in Little-Britian,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: British Library.

person.persName: J. Wright, next to the Globe
